metadata.title: Seismic Testing and Analysis for Earthquake Risk Assessment

abstract.text: Seismic testing provides critical insight into subsurface structures and earthquake hazards. This paper examines seismic wave propagation and ground motion analysis.

body_text.text: Earthquakes generate seismic waves that travel through geological layers. Analyzing these waves helps assess fault activity and subsurface properties.
Seismic sensors and accelerometers were deployed to collect waveforms for frequency and amplitude analysis.
Results reveal correlations between wave velocity anomalies and active fault zones.
